customCommands.name: View Job Database
customCommands.command: cd /home/simon/Learning-Management-System-Academy/job-search-toolkit && /usr/bin/python3 -c "import sqlite3; db=sqlite3.connect('data/job_search.db'); cursor=db.cursor(); cursor.execute('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opportunities'); print(f'Total Jobs: {cursor.fetchone()[0]}'); cursor.execute('SELECT title, company, salary_range FROM opportunities LIMIT 5'); [print(f'{row[0]} @ {row[1]}: {row[2]}') for row in cursor.fetchall()]"

customCommands.name: View LinkedIn Activity
customCommands.command: cd /home/simon/Learning-Management-System-Academy/job-search-toolkit && /usr/bin/python3 -c "import sqlite3; db=sqlite3.connect('data/linkedin_contacts.db'); cursor=db.cursor(); cursor.execute('SELECT SUM(connections_sent), SUM(messages_sent) FROM daily_activity'); row=cursor.fetchone(); print(f'Total Connections: {row[0] or 0}'); print(f'Total Messages: {row[1] or 0}')"
